name: American Police Ghost Sniper
description:
Welcome to the American Police Ghost Sniper: Grand City Sniper!
Remember the terrorist strike to the LA in the late 90's? Real City Sniper Hero Mission 2017 provides you with the real-life experience of undergoing a survival mission using best sniper shooting skills to eradicate all the terrorists. This is the best long-range sniper shooting game which gives you the ultimate pleasure of virtual shooting. An ultimate hd sniper shooting battle against city mafia crime has just started where a sniper shooting target killer hero will fight for extreme city survival and snipe away the villain criminals in this incredible sniper hero: survival mission'17.

Features:

- Stealth shooting missions for sniper Contract Killer
- Target hidden enemies as combat sniper superhero
- Ultimate shooting game with deadly sniper rifles
- High-quality graphics and virtual sniper display
- Real life shooting sound effects
- Slown Motion animation of bullets
